entities.name: scar
entities.description: The lightning-bolt scar on Harry's forehead is described as still stinging and looking normal.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who has a dream about Voldemort and wakes up with a stinging scar.

entities.name: Voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned in Harry's dream as having a cold, high voice.

entities.name: Peter
entities.description: Peter, nicknamed Wormtail, is one of the people in Harry's dream.

entities.name: snake
entities.description: A snake is present on a hearth rug in Harry's dream.

relationships.description: The scar is described as being on Harry's forehead.
Harry had a dream about Voldemort and felt a chill at the thought of him.
Peter is nicknamed Wormtail in Harry's dream.
Harry saw a snake on a hearth rug in his dream.
